Arrived in perfect condition, color was as it appeared in pictures, very high quality and flattering. I may purchase in other colors.  This is my second one. Very nice quality. Although instructions are not to wash/dry except by hand, I have chosen to use the washer on cold water and dry on gentle inside out. There has been some shrinkage, so my second one is up a size to medium. The small still fits but no longer just skims. It has become more fitted. Hopefully, the medium will shrink a little since it’s slightly loose, this was exactly what I was going for. After I launder it a number of times, I’ll try to update my review regarding fit for others who dislike handwashing as much as I do. For reference, I am 5’3” and 132 lbs.

The summer heat is no match for the Zeagoo Women's Knit Short Sleeve Top! I recently got mine in Stripe02 (Medium), and it's quickly become a go-to piece for warm weather. Here's why it earns a perfect 5-star review:  Comfortable and Breathable: The knit material is lightweight and soft, allowing your skin to breathe on hot days. It keeps you cool and comfortable without sacrificing style. Flattering Fit: The top drapes nicely and has a relaxed fit that's universally flattering. It skims your curves without clinging, perfect for various body types. Stripes Done Right: The Stripe02 pattern offers a stylish touch without being overwhelming. It adds a bit of visual interest to a classic design, making it perfect for casual summer outfits. Versatility Reigns Supreme: This top pairs effortlessly with everything! Dress it up with a skirt and sandals or keep it casual with shorts and sneakers. It's a versatile piece that can easily transition between different looks. Quality Craftsmanship: The Zeagoo top feels well-made with clean stitching and nice attention to detail. It looks more expensive than it is, making it a great value.

评论概述: Vine Customer Review of Free Product:  Fabulous Comfortable Chic Top For Your Wardrobe!
评论详情: As a Vine Voice Customer, I received this product for free from Amazon Vine. This is an objective review based on my use of this product. All opinions are my own.I've  been looking for warmer weather tops to piece into my Spring and Summer wardrobe here in the San Francisco Bay Area.  Tops that can easily transition from casual to more dressy and professional wear.  Saw this lovely Zeago top, and thought I would give it a try.My-oh-My, this top is an absolute must have for versatility in your warmer weather wardrobe!  Everything about it exceeded my expectations.  Lovely soft and comfortable fabric; the beautiful light tan and very dark navy blue strip color combination is a neutral that blends in with all of my wardrobe.  Love the chic asymmetrical hem and slits in the sleeves.  The sleeves have a beautiful flow to them, with a length falling just about elbow length on me.  Perfect!Excellent quality and craftsmanship, the inside seaming does not irritate my sensitive skin.  Love the fashionable ribbed edging and the very comfortable crew neck.  This wonderful top easily transitions from casual to dressy or professional wear with the addition of accessories such as a necklace or scarf.  Great for cooler weather to layer under a cardigan or a jacket.  A wonderful value, too.I recommend cold water wash and air dry for the best care of this lovely top.I highly recommend this product.

The material is comfy and I got so many compliments when I wore to work. As far as color, it is exactly as pictured and not overly hot either.  I can definitely see myself getting this is several colors!

I love the color and the material, perfect for casual wear. The fit is not oversized so if in between sizes, definitely size up. I'm 5.4" ,135 lbs. and size M fits just right but I like loose fit so I wish I have ordered L. Overall, really nice blouse.

This is a pretty, light pink shirt with dark pink accents on the hem and sleeves. This has a nice length which is great especially when ordering an XL or XXL. Those shirts often tend to be a bit short, but this one is a perfect length. The material is soft and comfortable. It fits true to size. I ordered an XL and it fits perfectly. (I usually wear an XL or XXL.)  This shirt is casual and would work perfectly with jeans or a denim skirt, and can be dressed up with pearls and a "church" skirt or fancy pants. The all around perfect lightweight spring, summer, or fall shirt. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Stay Stylish and Comfortable with Zeagoo Women's Knit Short Sleeve Pullover Blouse
评论详情: Discover the perfect blend of comfort and style with the Zeagoo Women's Knit Short Sleeve Tops. This summer essential is garnering rave reviews for its versatile design and effortless chic.  Crafted from high-quality knit fabric, this pullover blouse offers a soft and breathable feel, ensuring all-day comfort even in the warmest weather. The short sleeve design provides a relaxed and casual look, making it ideal for everyday wear or casual outings.  But it's not just about comfort—the blouse's understated elegance adds a touch of sophistication to any ensemble. Whether paired with jeans for a laid-back vibe or dressed up with a skirt for a more polished look, it effortlessly transitions from day to night.  love the versatility of this blouse, praising its ability to be dressed up or down for any occasion. Its flattering silhouette and easy-to-wear design make it a wardrobe staple that can be styled in countless ways.  From its soft knit fabric to its timeless design, the Zeagoo Women's Knit Short Sleeve Pullover Blouse is a must-have addition to any summer wardrobe. Stay stylish and comfortable all season long with this essential piece.

评论概述: Such a cute top to wear anytime of the year.
评论详情: Another great top from Zeagoo that gives a great look. A woman's knit short sleeved top that can be worn any time of the year. The fabric reminds me a little of how a nice sweater would feel. It feels good on. I got the 2x and it fit perfect. So sizing is what it should be because I always get 2X wherever I go. I don't usually like tops that have stripes, but this is definitely an exception. It looks so cute on. It quickly became one of my favorite tops. It says it is short sleeved, but they don't feel or look like short sleeves to me. A little longer than what I imagine short sleeves to be. They go down to the elbow. But that is perfectly fine for me. It's really cute that way. I was worried that it might wear too warm, but it doesn't. And it doesn't wear heavy at all. Although, Its heavier than your typical top or blouse.

This top is more like a light sweater. It's very well made. I'm rating it 5 stars because it is indeed a quality article of clothing. On a personal level, however, I would return it if I could. The neckline is too high and small, the sleeve detail is kinda lost, as is the minimal high-low effect. It isn't flattering on 5'2" 40D me. It wasn't even classy; it was just boring! Zzzz!

This is a very well-made shirt that is comfortable to wear and matches well with other clothing. The quality of material is great. There is no shrinkage or wrinkle after washing it in the laundry machine. The fit is true to size. I like simple design and casual look of the shirt.

It’s well made and is very lightweight and soft.  I got it in the navy-blue color which is lighter than what I consider navy, but it does look just like what’s shown in the pictures so no complaints.  The splits on the sleeves and hem add a nice subtle detail and the white stripes make a striking contrast.  I think it has a little bit of a nautical look to it and it looks great with jeans.

I love the color on this sweater.  It is a nice length for maxi skirt or jeans.  It is easy to steam and thin enough for spring / summer.  Wash in garment bag .  You need to wear a nude bra with this.

I got so many compliments on this shirt today. It’s so comfortable, very soft, and incredibly lightweight and thin (but not sheer). The blue color is earthy and so beautiful. The material does fold/crease somewhat easily, especially on the bottom/sleeve edges. Hoping it holds up well through the wash. But it fits perfectly and is a decently flattering shirt (though my photo doesn’t show that the best). Overall I really love it, totally would recommend!
It’s so pretty! Soft, comfortable, and fits as expected for size. It is a beautiful complement to your wardrobe, and definitely worth the buy!!!
